text: Top shot of small town Bareilly. It’s early winter. Little fog. Smoke in a few places.

Camera crosses empty terraces and moves inside a room to stop over a girl sleeping with her face covered with bedsheet. Camera travels back from the bedsheet covered girl to the woman in the courtyard on ground floor. We see top angle shot of a woman praying around a Tulsi plant. It is placed next to the prayer room.

INT. BITTI COURTYARD —- CONTINUOUS 3 Mother, around 45 years old, is praying around the Tulsi plant, ringing the bell, already bathed. Father, around 50 years old, walks out of a room ina sweater and pyjama, looking a bit sleepy.
Susheela, O Susheela. Arre hamaari cigarette dekhi hai kya? Mother makes her eyes bigger and rings the bell louder to indicate that she is praying. Father shows her an empty cigarette packet.
Arre kal raat isme ek baaki thi. Mother continues to pray. Father looks hassled.
Iske bina subah utarti bhi toh nahi hai. Mother makes a face as she prays. Father requests her.

Arre Pilibhit/Bijauria jaana hai mithai deliver karne. Bina fresh hue nikle aur raaste mein aa gayi toh gajab ho jaayega. Mother makes a face and requests heavens to pardon her husband as she continues to pray.
Itni subah kahin milegi bhi nahi. Bitti se maang ke laa do na. Mother looks scandalized and finishes her prayer quickly.
(irritated, surprised) Bitti ke paas kahaan se aayegi cigarette?
Arre wohh peeti hai. Mother is scandalized as she looks at the father suspiciously. c/u of Father nods to indicate that it's the truth.
Maang lo bhai, urgent hai. Cut to Mother grumbles as she moves towards terrace.
Bas ek cigarette ki kami reh gayi thi laundiya mein. Cut to Father taunts from behind.
Kuch din aur ruk jaao, desi daru bhi milegi uske paas. INT. BITTI ROOM — CONTINUOUS 4 Mother walks up to a girl sleeping with her face covered with rajaai. She shakes her and tries to wake her up.
Bitti, ai Bitti. Bitti replies without getting up.
Kya kar rahe ho jaanu. Mother pulls the bedsheet.
Jaanu ki bachchi!!! Cut to Bitti’s face as she struggles to opens her eyes and see her mother in daylight. She is a young girl around 28.
Kya ma, kitna achcha sapna dekh rahi thi.
Tu bas sapne hee dekhti reh. Bitti goes back to sleep. Mother shakes her. She cringes and opens her eyes again.
Kya hai?
(HESITANTLY) Sunn, tere paas cigarette hai? Bitti opens her eyes wide as she sits up.
Hainnn!!! Tu kab se cigarette peene lagi?
Jyaada bann matt. Cigarette hai? Tere papa ko chahiye.
Arre hum nahi peete hain. Mother looks at her suspiciously as she picks the empty water bottle kept next and pulls the clothes scattered. (doing some cleaning)
Nahi peete hain bhai. Laga lo sau sau ki.

Dekh tere saath behas karne ka time nahi hai hamaare paas. Papa ko Unnav jaana hai, ho nahi rahi hai. cut to Bitti sighs as she struggles to get up from the bed and stand to see mom has walked out. C/u of Bitti still half asleep, lazily sleeps back in shishuaasan.
(in the pose) Laate hain kahin se maang ke.
INT. BITTI COURTYARD —- CONTINUOUS 5 Bitti is walking down. Father sitting and standing again (impatient) sees her coming down and going out.

(Screaming) Hame pata hai tumhee ne chura ke pee hai. Bitti walking towards the door. C/u of wearing her father’s bathroom slippers with socks. Wide shot of Bitti not even looking at him as she walks out.
Thoda aur jor laga ke chilla lo, apne aap ho jaayegi.
EXT. BITTI LANE OUTSIDE HOUSE —- CONTINUOUS 6 Bitti is walking in the lane. A man is sitting outside his house and smoking.
Chacha, papa ko urgent hai.
Ek hee hai beta. Bitti takes the burning cigarette from him.

Chalegi. Thanks. Bitti walks away with the cigarette as the man watches. As she walks, she looks around and takes a few drags just outside her house door. C/u of her taking the drag, smoke flying in the cold alr. She closes the mansion gate which says "Mishra Sadan” Wide shot of her stepping inside the house.
INT. BITTI COURTYARD —- CONTINUOUS 7 Bitti in the courtyard. It’s empty.
She climbs up to see her mother sitting beside the railing on a cane two seater chair with folded newspapers and peas kept on the cane table in front. She asks her mother who is peeling peas now.

Kahan hai papa? Mother with reading glasses moves her face towards one direction points towards the loo and make a face. Cut to Bitti walking toward the loo knocks on the door. C/u of Bitti’s ear close to the door.
Hmmm.
Hui?
Uh huh. Bitti puts the burning cigarette on a hole on the door.
Ye lo. Cut to the cigarette getting sucked inside in a flash. Cut to Bitti walking and sitting next to her mother on the cane sofa. She reaches out for the peeled peas. Mother hits her on her hand.
Haath dho ke aa.
Arre humne thodi na ke hain. Bitti looking at her irritated picks the bottle kept on the table and washes her hands on the rose pot behind.
Bitti wiping her hands with her mother’s pallu making a smiling quirky face.
Ye hain Bitti Mishra. cut to mother who is gives her a look.
Daughter of missej Susheela Mishra. Cut to loo door.  10
And son of mister Narottam Mishra.
Bitti pops in a few peeled peas as mother nudges. C/u of Bitti looking at her to irritate more as she take the news paper to read.
Ab unhone toh bete ki tarah hee paala hai na. INT. SCHOOL —- DAY 9 Bitti’s mother turns back to class after writing Myself on the board.
Susheela Mishra Narmada Primary school mein bachchon ko wohh sikhaati hain jo Bitti Mishra ne kabhi nahi seekha. Bitti’s mother turning towards the class.
Bachchon ko badon ki aagya ka... Kids looking at her and the board.
Paalan karna chahiye!!!

A busy sweet shop and the name of the shop is written “lovla sweets” (Dont show signboard in the beginning else joke later will fall flat) C/u of Bitti’s father is attending to a customer at the sweet shop.
Aur Narottam Mishra ki mithai se zyada meethi unki boli hai.

(sweetly) Bhaisaab Shanno meri beti nahi hai? Ab uski shaadi mein mithai kam pad gayi toh aapki naak ke saath saath naak toh meri bhi kategi na (turns to attendant) paanch kilo aur taul de beta. Suddenly he sees a pulsar coming to a sudden halt in front of his shop and Bitti getting down, who was sitting like a boy. The rider looks like a chhapri. Bitti walks towards father.
Ye kawwa kaun hai?
Kawwa nahi papa mor hai, aaj nahaaya nahi hoga.
Hai kaun?
Apne mohalle ka hee hai. Humne lift maangi, usne de di, humne kaha chhod do, usne chhod diya. Wohh chhodo sau rupai nikalo jaldi se.
Khud kamaati ho toh humse kyon Maangti ho?
Ye sweater hum apni kamaai se gift kiye the na? Laao do. Father puts hand inside his sweater and hesitantly takes out a hundred rupee note from his shirt pocket and gives her.
Ye lo.  11 12 13 Bitti tries to take the note and walk away but realizes that he is holding on to the note. She looks at him.
Beta dono pair ek side karke hee baitha kar bike pe. Bitti makes a ‘chatt’ sound from her mouth, grabs an imarti and walks out eating.
Bitti Mishra apni sharton pe jeeti hai.
Wide shot of terrace landscape.
EXT. BITTI’S TERRACE - EVENING 12 Bitti is smoking a cigarette, sitting with her friend Rama, against the boundary wall.
Chhup chhup ke cigarette peeti hai.
C/u of food. Cut to Bitti and Rama are standing by a stall, holding their respective dishes. Bitti looks around and takes a bite from Rama’s plate and relishes it.
Ek baar dhoke se non-veg kha liya tha. Ab har mauke pe khaati hai.
14 15 16 10. EXT. BITTI’S COLONY LANE - DAY 14 Wide shot of colony lane. Cut to Bitti standing slyly in one corner. One guy comes and hands her a pen drive.
Bitti Hollywood ki filmo ka shauk bhi rakhti hai.

India mein release bhi nahi hui hai abhi. Bitti gives him a flying kiss. The guy smiles as if he has been paid back handsomely. EXT. RAMA’S BOUTIQUE - DAY 15 The boutique’s signboard reads “Forever 25” and aside there is a board which has “SUNDAY CLOSED” written on it. Another signboard on the side reads “Credit and Debit cards expected.”
Jiska matinee show chalta hai Bitti ki best friend Rama ke boutique mein. INT. RAMA’S BOUTIQUE —- CONTINUOUS 16 Bitti and Rama are keenly watching the movie on a laptop.
Sixty percent samajh leti hai par hundred percent samjha deti hai.
I want to break-up with you.
Main tumhe todna chahta hoon.
Are you kidding me?  11.
Pagla gaye ho kaa?
Wide shot of Early Morning Bareilly City
Wide shot of busy government office where Bitti is sitting on one of the desk. C/u of Bitti reading a novel on her desk.
Bitti bijli vibhaav ke shikayat department mein kaam karti hain. C/u Phone rings. Bitti picks it up and speaks without listening.
Poore shahar ki gayi hai. Thodi der mein aa jaayegi. Asuvidha ke liye khed hai.
Hamaare pados mein toh hai.
Unke yahaan invertor hai. Aap bhi lagwa leejiye. Aapka—din— shubh_ho Bitti cuts the phone. A-peon places_a_—cup of tea on the table he looks at
BITTT (cont Dy . : li ki .
20 12. EXT. BITTI’S TERRACE —- EVENING 18 Bitti in home clothes is doing a break dance. Rama is sitting nearby. Other boys are watching her in awe from their respective terraces.
Bitti mohalle ki eklauti aisi ladki hai jo break dance kar leti hai.
BITTI on scooter, wearing jacket enters the place.
Old aunties dancing. Bitti is somewhere in between them Prelude to start her dance in a sangeet.
Isiliye mohalle ka koi bhi ladies sangeet is lady ke performance ke bina complete nahi hota. Bitti starts to dance. Song 1 - Credit titles start rolling.
INT. BITTI’S ROOM - NIGHT 20 Bitti is taking off her jewelry after the sangeet, looking at her reflection sadly.
Par ek baat hai jo Bitti ki mummy ko din raat khaaye rehti hai. Mother taunts from outside.  21 13.
Jindagi bhar doosron ke sangeet mein hee naachiyo. Bitti hears what her mother has said. She continues to take off her jewelry sadly.
Bitti ka rishta hee pakka nahi ho pa raha hai. Do baar baat sagaai tak pahunchi, par toot gayi.
EXT. BITTI’S TERRACE - NIGHT 21 Bitti is talking to her father. She is in a sombre mood.
Kya hua? Bitti keeps quiet. He shows her a cigarette asking her if she wants it.
Hmmm? Bitti shakes her head in a no.
Beta tum ma ki baat ka bura mat Maana karo. Arre bahut pyaar karti hai tumko. Bitti nods understandingly.

Main ladka hoti toh sab sahi hota na? Koi kuch sawaal nahi karta. Cigarette peeta hai, bhai ladka hai. Der raat baahar ghoomta hai, ladke toh ghoomte hee hain. Jo muh mein aata hai bak deta hai, dil ka saaf hai. (MORE )
Do sagaai toot gayi toh kya, ab nahi pasand aayi toh nahi aayi, kisi se bhi kar lega kya. Ladki hona na disaster hai.
Samaaj hai beta, aisa hee hai. Nahi, hum nahi maante hain par ab rehna toh issi mein hai. Kya karein (shows her cigarette again) hmmm? Bitti looks at the cigarette a tad longer.
Aapke liye hai?
Haan. Bitti asks dad for matchbox and he searches in his pocket but couldn’t find it. She looks at him with a touch of smile. Wide angle. Back shot of both of them smoking on the terrace.
INT. COURTYARD —- DAY 22 Another boy has come to see Bitti with his family.
Jaao beta tum log akele mein baat waat kar lo. Bitti and boy get up and leave. Mother turns to boy’s family and speaks proudly.
Bijli vibhaav ke shikayat department mein kaam karti hai Bitti. Din ki sau shikaayatein aati hain par aaj tak Bitti ki ek bhi shikayat nahi aayi. Family looks impressed.  23 15.
Balushahi leejiye na. Chhed waali balushahi poore Bareilly mein sirf Mishara ji banaate hain. Father smiles politely.
INT. BITTI’S ROOM - DAY 23 Bitti is sitting with the boy by the verandah.
Party warty mein kabhi kabhaar ho jaati hai but waise I don’t drink. Bitti nods understandingly and gives him a fake smile.
Ek cheez bas mujhe aapse poochhni thi.
Poochhiye
Are you a... aap virgin hai kya? Bitti stares at him
Virgin... hain kya?
Aap hain?
Uss se kya fark padta hai? Aap hain ki nahi uss se fark padta hai. Bitti thinks for a moment as she stares the boy.
Nahi hain. Ab?  24 25 26 16. The boy is shocked.
C/u of Bitti’s mother is putting the namkeen back from plates into the jars. Father picking the mithai from plate putting into the box.
Ittne ladke dekh gaye, kisi ko pasand nahi aa rahi. Kuch toh khaami hogi usme. Hum samjhaayein toh bidak jaati hai aur aapko samjhaana aata hee nahi.
Toh ka karein?

Ka karein??? Sab aaphee ka kiya dhara hai. Harkatein sab laundon wali hain. Iss se achcha tha ki launda hee paida ho jaata. Mother picks a mithai from the box to eat. As father walk out of the kitchen.
Bitti sees her father walking out. She is sitting quietly on the cot outside the kitchen listening to her parents arguing. She has tears in her eyes.
Mother and father are sleeping. Bitti comes on door with a bag and looks at them sleeping. She takes a deep breath.
Bitti is standing on the road asking an auto to stop. Auto doesn’t stop.
Bitti is pillion riding on a scooter, sitting with both legs on one side. Wide shot of the bike going into oblivion.
C/u of Bitti asking the clerk sitting inside.
Ek ticket.
Kahaan ka?
Kahin ka bhi.
Hain??? Cut to c/u of Bitti as she takes the ticket.
Haan.
Wide shot of Bitti is sitting on a bench. Cut to c/u of Bitti looking up at someone. Cut to Hawaldaar standing in front of her.
Akele ja rahi hain?  31 18.
Haan.
Kahaan?
Sasural. Hawaladar looks at her carefully.
Sindoor aur mangalsootra kahaan hai?
Christian hain. Hawaldar gives her a blank look.
Happy journey. Wide shot of He walking away. As she sits along on the bench
Amritsar se chal kar Jaynagar ki or jaane waali Shaheed express apne nirdharit samay se do ghante ki deri se chal rahi hai.
c/u of her making a disgusted face turning as she spots a book stall nearby. She gets up leaving her bag, comes back to pick her bag and walks towards the stall.

Yaatriyon ko hone waali asuvidha ke liye hame khed hai. Bitti reaches the stall. Cut to Munna, a young man around 25 years old, is sleeping behind the counter with his mouth open. Cut to Bitti checks a few novels and picks up one.  19.
Bhaiyya. Munna continues to sleep.
O bhaiyya. Munna continues to sleep. Bitti throws the book at him. Munna wakes up in a jiffy, looks at Bitti and adjust his hair.
Haan ji boliye.
Woh kitaab kitne ki hai?
Kaunsi?
Jiss se aap jaage. Munna looks at the book lying on the floor.
Ye... (picks it up) dedh sau.
Koi aur nahi hai sasti wali? Munna picks up a novel and puts it in front of her.
Ye le leejiye, assi ki hai, saath mein de denge. Bitti picks up the book and looks at it.
Bareilly ki barfi?
Chaliye pachaas de deejiye. Bitti is looking at the book.  32 33 34 35 20.
Chaalees se kam nahi ho paayega, sorry. Bitti is about to keep the book down. C/u of munna giving the book.
Achcha tees hain?
Bitti is reading the book sitting by the window in general compartment. Music takes over as she reads the book. Her eyes go wide as she turns the pages. She turns another page in a hurry.
Train crosses in full speed.
Bitti closes the book and looks stunned.
Train comes to halt at a station.
Bitti looks out. There is another train going in the opposite direction. She calls out to the guy at the opposite window.
Ye Bareilly rukti hai?
Haan.
EXT. IN BETWEEN TRAINS —- CONTINUOUS 37 Bitti gets down from her train and hops on to the other.
INT. BITTI’S ROOM —- EARLY MORNING 38 Bitti’s mother, looking horrified, is reading a letter.

Hum ja rahe hain ma. Tumhare aur papa ki sukh shanti ke liye ye hee achcha hai. Jo tumne blouse mein hajaar ka note phasa ke rakha tha woh sath liye ja rahe hain. Mother gently touches her blouse and continues to read.

Usko aur humko dhoondhne ki koshish mat karna. Tumhaari museebat... (turns and screams) Bitttttiiiiii. And she stops abruptly. Bitti is standing at the door with bags Mother gets emotional. She hugs Bitti.  39 22.
Kahaan ja rahi thi karamjali?
Ghar chhod ke.
Toh gayi kyon nahi?
Tumhaari khushi dekhi nahi jaati na humse, issi liye. Both look at each other with tears in their eyes.
Mein sone ja rahi hu
Pura din soti rehti hai Father enters the frame from behind.
Arre bhai bharat milaap ho gaya ho toh chai pila do.
INT. RAMA’S BOUTIQUE - DAY 39 Aunty with the magazine is sitting with Rama and telling her to design a dress similar to that picture Rama is cutting a magazine design of a dress.
Pagla gayi ho ka? Ghar chhod ke ja rahi thi. Bitti placing the book on her magazine.
Arre pagla toh tu jaayegi. Ye dekh. Rama picks the book.
Bareilly ki barfi?  23. Bitti sits on the table.
Padh padh padh. Rama starts reading the book.
Poora nahi, jitta mark kiya hain utta padh.
(reading) Bareily mein rehti hai, break dance karti hai, chhup chhup ke cigarette peeti hai, baat baat pe sau ki shart lagaati hai. Rama looks amazed.
Ye toh tu hai.
Haina?... Bareily ki barfi... Bitti. Aisi aisi baatein likhi hain jo sirf tujhe aur mujhe pata hain. Rama is speechless as she flips pages.
Hamare jaisi sirf hum hee nahi. Aur... koi toh hai, jisse lagta hai main jaisi bhi hoon achchi hoon aur usse pasand hoon.
Is barfi ka maalpua hai kaun? Rama looks at the book.
Isne likhi hai? Pritam Vidrohi? Jaanti hai isko?
Tch. Bitti shakes her head in a no.
Wide shot of a bike coming towards camera. When the bike comes closer it’s Chirag riding on his bike, wearing latest goggles.
Ab aapko lag raha hoga ki ye Pritam Vidrohi hain. Hain na? Nahi hain. Ye hain apne ghar ke eklaute Chirag... Chirag Dubey.
Chirag parks the bike and climbs the steps acknowledging people.
Inke pitaji ka sapna tha ki ye doctor ya engineer bann ke note chhaapein. Chhaapte ye ab bhi hain...
Chirag enters the press and looks at the shop. He places a titled wedding card straight on the rack on the front.
Lekin pamphlet, visiting card, shaadi ke card ityadi... apne pitaji ki printing press mein.
Chirag is looking at some papers getting printed. As he passed he stops near the DTP operator.
(bending and looking at him) Rajesh wets Priti nahi naalayak, Rajesh Weds Priti.  44 45 46 25. C/u of him looking at the DTP guy, removing the T and typing a ‘d’ on keyboard.
Din bhar kaam karte hain.
INT. CHIRAG’S ROOM - NIGHT 44 Chirag is pouring a drink.
Aur raat mein jaam bharte hain, Babli ke sath. Aa ba... Babli dikh nahi rahi? Chirag takes out a snap from his wallet.
Ai... ye aa gayi. C/u of Chirag is looking at the snap as he drinks and tears start rolling.
Kehte hain wagt har zakhm bhar deta hai. Inka abhi bhi hara hai. Paanch saal pehle Babli inke purse mein nahi inke paas mein thi.

Chirag and babli on a bike with a kite flying tied to the bike. EXT. MARKET ROAD — EVENING 46 Chirag and babli eating pani puri. Chirag putting one in her mouth as she gobbles one more.  47 48 49 50 51 26.
Chirag and Babli at his home blowing a heart candle and smiles at her.
Babli slowly closes her house door as chirag says bye with coy. C/u of Door shutting.
Babli ke bina inka time pass nahi hota tha. Par Babli ke liye ye sirf timepass the.
EXT. MARRIAGE HALL —- NIGHT 49 C/u of Chirag standing behind the pandal, crying louder seeing Babli crying while leaving her folks after getting married.
Babli ki vidaai mein Babli se zyada ye roye the.
INT. CHIRAG’S ROOM - NIGHT 50 Chirag is drinking, looking at Babli’s snap.
Us din se inki zindagi mein koi aayi hee nahi...
INT. CHIRAG’S HOUSE - MORNING 51 Chirag’s mother is showing him the snaps of girls. Chirag shakes his head in a no, keeping the photo straight.  27.
++. kyonki inko aur koi bhaayi hee nahi. Mother puts another snap in front of him.
Rajni?
Na khud peeti hai, na peene degi. Mother makes a face.
Bindiya?
Bas dikhti shareef hai.
Kusum?
Bina make up ke dikhe toh asli shakal maaloom pade. Mom is exasperated.
Jaise tu bada heera hai. Chirag gets irritated and walks out taking the stairs down.
Aaj bhi har ladki mein Babli ko dhoondh rahe hain.
Chirag is riding on his bike.
Bitti ki tarah Chirag ka bhi Pritam Vidrohi ke saath ek ajeeb sa connection hai.
53 54 28. INT. CHIRAG’S ROOM - NIGHT 53 Chirag is writing something, wearing the same sherwani he had worn in Babli’s wedding.
Jis raat Babli apne ghar se aur inki zindagi se vida hui thi ussi raat inhone apni prem kahaani ko amar banaane ki bheeshma pratigya le lee thi.
c/u of machine is making some noise Wide shot of chirag and Munna standing against the machine. Cut to Munna reading the manuscript. Chirag is watching him in eager.
Aur inki kitaab ka first draft padha inke langotiya yaar Munna ne, jinse aap thodi der pehle book stall pe mil chuke hain. Cut to Munna asking in wonder.
Toone likhi hai?
(emotionally) Aansuon ne likhi hai.
Photo khinchwa lo lalla, kitaab pe daalni padti hai. Chirag shakes his head in a no.
Par Chirag babu thehre sachche aashiq.

Chirag is staring at the game on TV while Munna is playing game of hitting As the man on the game is hit, Munna rejoice and looks at Chirag, but it does not distract Chirag, he is still thinking. C/u of chirag looking at Munna and smiling (he has got a idea)
Apni photo ke sath chhapte toh Babli badnaam ho jaati. Munna ki photo ke saath chhapte toh kitaab badnaam ho jaati. Ab bas ek maatra bharose ka muhbola dost bacha tha.
EXT. TEA STALL —- EARLY EVENING 56 Pritam Vidrohi, a soft spoken and meek looking guy, is narrating his poem to friends. Chirag and Munna are also sitting there.

Preet ki reet mein aiso uljho, khol sako na koi, preet ki reet mein bas uljhan hai, kahat Pritam Vidrohi. Friends applaud. One of the guys raises his hand and Pritam gets scared and takes a defensive pose. Friend smiles and pats on Pritam’s back and Pritam looks relieved. Chirag and Munna exchange a smile. C/u of chirag having that mission accomplished look.
INT. PRITAM’S ROOM - NIGHT 57 Pritam is shaking his head in a scared no. Chirag and Munna are sitting in front of him.  30. c/u of Manuscript is lying nearby.
Par likhi toh aapne hai na Chirag Bhaiya.
Haan toh?
Toh mere naam se kaise chhap sakti hai?
Kyon nahi chhap sakti be?
(scared) Nahi... chhap sakti hai par chhapni nahi chahiye. Galat hoga.
Galat toh ye hoga ki hum jabardasti chhap dein aur tum kuch ukhaad bhi na paao. Pritam gulps down his saliva.
Dekho Vidrohi, dost ho isliye permission maang rahe hain. Pritam just looks at him. Chirag goes closer to him.
Ek baat aur lalla. Thukraaye hue aashiq ki haay mat lo. Jindagi bhar laundiya ko taras jaaoge. Pritam helplessly looks at Chirag and then looks at Munna.
Chirag and Munna are standing next to a photographer.
(sternly) Smile.  31. Pritam Vidrohi smiles forcefully and frame freezes.
Pages are getting published. Chirag and Munna are supervising.
Iske baad chupke se chhapi gayi thi... Chirag picks up the printed cover and smiles emotionally.
Bareilly ki Barfi. C/u of The back cover shows the snap of Pritam Vidrohi.
60 EXT. PRITAM’S COLONY LANE —- NIGHT 60 Quick cuts for various NGO women protesting outside his place. His mother is screaming in silence with tears (like three idiots mother)
Uske baad Pritam Vidrohi ke saath woh hua jo kisi ne sapne mein bhi nahi socha tha...
61 INT. PRITAM’S ROOM - NIGHT 61 Pritam wakes up sweating touching his face as if he is actually slapped.
...Sivaay Pritam Vidrohi ke.
62 63 64 65 66 32. INT.PRITAM HOUSE —- NIGHT 62 Pritam taking his mom photograph from the rack along with him crying and packs his bag. (in and out transtition)
EXT. PRITAM’S HOUSE LANE - NIGHT 63 Wide shot Pritam walking on the road, which turns into walking fast, looking back if someone noticed him.
EXT. RAILWAY PLATFORM —- NIGHT 64 Pritam is boarding a train still in tears.
Ussi raat badnami ke darr se Pritam Vidrohi shahar se palaayan kar gaye the.
INT. BOOK SHOP —- DAY 65 Chirag is keeping an eye on people buying books. One girl picks up Bareily ki Barfi, looks at it, giggles with her friend and keeps it back. Chirag is disappointed.
Khaamkhaan palaayan kar gaye. Ek copy tak nahi biki Bareilly ki Barfi ki.
EXT. CHIRAG’S HOUSE - DAY 66 Mother is selling the book to the raddi wala.  67 68 69 33.
Biki toh sirf raddi mein.
People eating samosa, kachori etc on a paper.
Aur dikhi toh sirf samosa, kachori, poha, jalebi ke neeche. A paper is thrown in bin. Title on top reads Bareily ki Barfi.
Munna is dusting the books in his stall.
Apne jigri ka dil rakhne ke liye Munna ne dus copies apne stall pe saja ke rakhi... with due prominence.

Chai... kadak hai beta.  166 167 96. Vidrohi smiles and takes the cup. Chirag feels a bit left out as everyone is paying attention to Vidrohi.
Achcha aunty ab hum chalte hain.
(To Chirag) Theek hai beta jaao (turns to Vidrohi) Tumhe bina khaaye nahi jaane denge. Chirag makes a face.

INT. BITTI’S HOUSE - DAY 166 They are having lunch. Vidrohi is getting attention by mother and Rama. Chirag is sitting and watching quietly, sulking and eating. Rama forcibly keeps a barfi in Vidrohi’s plate.
Arre barfi toh lo beta, bahut famous hai hamaare yahaan ki.
Jaante hain aunty. Bitti smiles as Vidrohi looks at her.
Vidrohi is sitting nervously watching Chirag pace up and down. He looks to his right and sees Munna eating banana and staring back at him. Munna then turns to Chirag.
Hum toh pehle hee bole the ki bhej do iss appendix ko waapas. (MORE)
Aap hee ko antibiotic ka course poora karna tha. Ho gaya na overdose. Chirag goes to slap Vidrohi.
Bahut shaktimaan bann rahe the... Vidrohi takes an evasive action.
Arre hum toh wahi kiye jo aap log sikhaaye rahe. Phir hum galat kaise ho gaye?
Phone pe kya bak raha tha bey? Laat maar ke koolha bigaadega mera?
Arre bhaiya hum character mein ghus chuke hain. Baar baar script change karenge toh performance looj ho jaayega na.
Kya jaroorat thi uski baap ki gardan mein ghusne ki?
Arre ek bujurg aadmi pain mein the, hum relief de diye. Hain toh aapke sasur hee na. Aur aapki help nahi kar rahe hain? Chirag looks around in frustration then turns back to Vidrohi.
Depress karne bheje the, tum impress kar ke aa gaye.
Theek hai bhaiya, phir hum waapas chale jaate hain.  168 169 98.
Pehle jo gobar kiye ho uske upley bana ke jaao. Vidrohi looks helpless.
INT. VIDROHI’S HOUSE - NIGHT 168 Vidrohi is finishing his dinner. He looks a bit emotional. His mother asks him for one more chapati.
Le ek aur le le.
Bas ho gaya amma (mumbles) subah se kha hee rahe hain. He gets up and washes his hands.
Theek se khaaya karo tum. Sookh ke titahdi ho gaye ho. Aise shareer pe sherwani achchi lagegi?
Arre hum hee mein hain sab khaamiyaan. Chhod do humko akela. He walks out. Mother screams from behind.
Aur waapas kab ja rahe ho?
Vidrohi is walking in his t shirt and pyjama. His shoulders are dropped. Bitti is standing at a pan shop. She notices Vidrohi walking past.
Vidrohi ji.  99. Vidrohi, still emotional, turns back and looks surprised on seeing Bitti. He immediately gets back into character.
Bitti ji, aap yahaan, itni raat ko?
Papa khaane ke baad pan na khaayein toh bade kadve ho jaate hain. Vidrohi smiles.
Aap yahaan kaise?
Hum khaane ke baad meetha na khaayein toh bade pheeke ho jaate hain. Bitti taunts with a smile.
Meetha thoda zyada khaya kijiye, kadwahat kam hogi aapki. Vidrohi’s smile disappears.
Hum itne kadve hain?
Nahi, par waise nahi hain jaisa humne socha tha... matlab maine aur Rama ne.
Kya socha tha aapne... aur Rama ne?
Nahi... letters aapke saare sringaar ras ke the, nikle aap veer ras ke.  170 100. Vidrohi puts his head down and looks emotional. Bitti looks at him and tries to correct herself.
Galat mat samajiyega. Aise bhi bure nahi hain aap. Vidrohi is getting more emotional.

Bure toh Bitti ji haalaat hote hain, log hote hain. Hum itne kadve nahi the... Bitti ji. Haalat aur logon ne hame kadva bana diya hai. Aur kadve insaano mein bhi dil hota hai Bitti ji, jo kadva nahi hota. Vidrohi is teary eyed. Bitti is surprised.
Vidrohi ji... aap theek toh hain? She holds his hands. Vidrohi looks at her teary eyed. Then he turns to the sweet shop guy.
(emotionally) Ek malai maalpua (pauses) do kar de.
INT. /EXT. RAMA’S BOUTIQUE 170 Rama and Bitti are drinking whiskey in khulhad. Rama is laughing.
Malai malpua (laughs uncontrollably)
Yaar Vidrohi ji waise nahi hain jaisa main soch rahi thi.
(little drunk) Tu kaisa soch rahi thi?  101.
Arre...Dil ke bahut achche aadmi hain woh.
Tu bol rahi hai? Tera pyaar bol raha hai, ya whiskey? (Teases and giggles)
Tujhe chadh gayi hai chudail. Rama checks if her mouth is stinking of alcohol.
Papa ko pata pada na toh utaar denge. Bitti gives her some garlic.
Tension mat le. Ye le.
Lehsun?

Lehsun nahi, license hai, sharab peene ka. Do chaba le, kisi ko pata bhi nahi padega gaumootra piya ya somras. (Holding garlic) Isse na ladkiyaan sanskaari bani rehti hain. Bitti looks a little drunk as she laughs.
171 EXT. DAM —- AFTERNOON 171 Chirag and Bitti are sitting and eating Peanuts
Tumne bataaya nahi kaise lage Vidrohi ji?
Tumne poochcha hee nahi.  Chirag’s 102.
Unke aane ke baad toh tumhe meri yaad hee nahi aayi. Ek phone tak nahi kiya.
Tum bhi toh kar sakte the.
Hmmm... kar toh sakta tha. Khair... kaise lagey Vidrohi ji?
Pehle baar mili na toh man kiya muh noch lun.
(gentle smile) Maine toh pehle hee kaha tha.
Lekin jab ghar aaye na toh laga ki itne bure bhi nahi hain. smile disappears.
Aur mummy papa to flat ho gaye.
Toh phir, aage ka kya socha hai?
Sochna kya hai, do hee baar toh mili hoon. Abhi toh baatein hongi, mulakaatein hongi, chandni raatein hongi. (Laughs teasingly)
Mujhse toh tum bahut baar mili ho, mere baare mein kya jaanti ho?
Yahi ki tum mere bahut achche friend ho.  103. Just then they see Munna and Vidrohi arrive on a bike. Bitti turns to Chirag again.
Jitna tumne kiya hai na mere liye utna kaun karta hai aajkal. Chirag smiles emotionally. Munna and Vidrohi are walking and talking under their breath.
Yaad rakh Vidrohi, aaj chapter close karna hai.
Ratta maar ke aaye hain bhaiya. Tension mat leejiye. Munna and Vidrohi walk up to them. Vidrohi greets Bitti and Chirag in style and then looks around.
Jaldi aa gaye.
Aadha ghanta late hain Vidrohi ji.
Chirag babu, ye location raat ko sharaab peene ki hai. Shaam ko moongphali khaane mein kya maja hai.
Jitni sharab aap peete hain, moongphali ki jagah kahaan bachti hogi pait mein. Bitti is watching their conversation.
Aap bilkul correct keh rahe hai Chirag babu. (MORE)
Har raat peene ke baad main khud ko yahi samjhaata hoon, lekin agle din phir bhool jaata hoon. Bitti giggles. Chirag looks worried. Munna jumps in.
Bhoolne ki beemari bhi hai inko (reminds Vidrohi) hain na! Vidrohi turns towards Bitti.
Arre haan, ek baat batana hi bhool gaya. Main ek baar jail bhi gaya hun. Munna and Chirag are happy to hear this.
Hey Bhagwaan, jail... criminal... ye toh bohot badi baat hai.
Arre koi badi baat nahi hai. Krishna Ji to paida hi jail mein huye thhe. Aur waise bhi har baat yaad rakhni bhi nahi chahiye.
Kal agar aapko bhool gaye toh? Chirag is looking at Bitti who is looking at Vidrohi. Then to his surprise Bitti smiles.
Itna aasaan nahi hai Bitti Mishra ko bhool paana. Laga lo sau sau ki. Aur kal tak toh bilkul nahi bhool paayenge.
(worried) Kal kya hai?  105.
Bhool gaye? Hamaari Lovely Sweets ka golden jubilee celebration hai (turns to Vidrohi) Aur aap na aayein aisa ho hee nahi sakta.
Nahi aa paayenge. Bitti and Vidrohi both ask.
Kyon nahi aa paayenge? Chirag turns to Bitti.
Aaj raat ye waapas ja rahe hain na. Chirag takes out a ticket and gives it to Vidrohi. Vidrohi looks at the ticket.
Haan waapas ja rahe hain.
Toh phir kaise aayenge?
(rapid fire) Haan kaise aayenge. Kyonki ye toh ja rahe hain. Aane ka sawaal hee paida nahi hota. Phir ye toh aane se rahe. Bitti snatches the ticket from Vidrohi’s hand.
Agar ye ticket phat gaya toh?
Phaadiyega mat... nahi toh hum aapse kabhi baat nahi karenge. Vidrohi turns towards Chirag and Munna.
Hai na?  106.
Haan.
Haan. Bitti gives the ticket back to Vidrohi.
Theek hai... jaaiye. Chirag and Munna smile.

Lekin jaane se pehle mera number delete kar deejiyega kyonki main hundred percent kar doongi. Bitti looks away. Chirag and Munna give each other a quiet low five. They look back and see that Vidrohi is looking emotionally at Bitti.
Vidrohi ji... nikla jaaye phir ab, hain? Bag bhi uthaana hai, dahi bhi khaana hai.
Dekhiye dukhi mat hoiye Bitti ji. Bitti doesn’t say anything. Chirag looks at Vidrohi getting emotional and looks worried.
Vidrohi ji, emotional hone ka waqt nahi hai ye. Vidrohi’s hand starts trembling, holding the ticket.
Badi mushkil se Vishnoi ji ko bol ke saansad kote mein confirm karwaaye hain. Vidrohi’s hand shivers more. He holds the ticket with other hand too, in a tearing position.  172 107.

(SCREAMING) Trainein pack chal rahi hain, rush ka season haiiii.... High speed shot - Vidrohi tears the ticket. Chirag and Munna are stunned. Vidrohi tosses the torn pieces in air which go flying in front of Chirag and Munna’s faces.
Aapka dil dukha ke toh nahi jaayenge. Bitti smiles. Chirag shakes his head in disbelief.
EXT. VIDROHI’S COURTYARD - NIGHT 172 Vidrohi’s head in inside water tank. He is gasping for breath. Chirag pulls his head out of water tank. Munna is holding Vidrohi’s hands.
(angry) Bitti ka dil dukha ke nahi jaayega.
Arre bhaiya baat toh suno... Chirag puts his head again in the water tank.
Ticket phaad diye. Chirag pulls Vidrohi out of water tank.
Hum mar mara gaye toh chaudah saal wait nahi karegi bhabhi. Chirag puts his head inside water tank again. Vidrohi gasps for breath again.  173 108. Chirag pulls Vidrohi out again.
Bhaiyaa maar hee do isko...
Arre hume Rama achchi lagti hai. Chirag, about to put Vidrohi back in water tank again, stops.
EXT. VIDROHI’S COURTYARD - NIGHT 173 Chirag is sitting on a cot opposite Vidrohi who is sitting on a stool. Munna is drying Vidrohi’s head with a towel.
Kya bol rahe the tum?
Hume Rama achchi lagti hai. Hum Rama ke liye ticket phaade the. Arre Bitti bhabhi toh... bhabhi hai na.
Rama ko tum achche lagte ho?

Arre wahi jaanne ke liye toh ticket phaade the ki hafte bhar ruk ke uska dil tatol ke dekhte hain. Agar hamaare naam ka moti mila toh hum bhi aapke saath ghodi chhadh jaayenge. Munna bends down and goes near Vidrohi’s left ear.
Sorry. Vidrohi hits his head with his left hand as if trying to take water out of his left ear and points to his right ear with his right hand.  109.
Idhar aake boliye. Is waale mein paani bhara hai. Munna bends to his right ear.
Sorry.
Huh!
Ab tum dil laga ke Rama mein dil lagaao. Hum hain na support karne ke liye. Chirag takes out a 500 rupee note and gives it to Vidrohi.
Aur suno, achcha sa gift khareed lena uske liye. Just then Vidrohi’s mother enters the house. She sees Vidrohi wet.
Arre kitni baar kahe hain ki raat ko mat nahaaya karo.
Aur dekhiye na aunty kapde pehan ke naha liya. Vidrohi gives a dirty look to Chirag.

The signboard now reads Lovely Sweets instead of Lovla Sweets. Only ‘ee ki maatra’ on Lovely looks brand new. Golden Jubilee celebrations. People are present there.  175 110. Vidrohi arrives, carrying a gift with Chirag, Chirag points at Rama, but Bitti’s father comes and takes the gift from Vidrohi and hugs him.
Iski kya jaroorat thi. Chirag exchanges with Vidrohi a helpless look. Bitti’s father cuts a big boondi ka laddoo and everyone claps. Bitti feeds laddoo to Vidrohi. Chirag makes a face.

head_text.subj: FUNNY DANCE MOVEMENT INSIDE THE SMALL SHOP AND THE

text: Chirag instigates Vidrohi to go for Rama. Series of sequences where Vidrohi is trying to impress Rama but Bitti is also getting impressed. Chirag is trying to make his presence felt. He tries to dance with Bitti but Bitti dances more with Vidrohi. Bitti’s parents are also noticing Vidrohi closely.
INT. FATHER’S BEDROOM - NIGHT 175 Father is staring at the ceiling. Mother is fast asleep.

(mumbling) Chalo pukhraj pehanne ka kuch toh faayda hua. Bitti ke liye ek ladka dhoond rahe the, mil gaye do. Ab chooj kar lo. Hai ki nahi. Aur aisa bhi nahi hai ki rasgulle aur bataashe mein se chooj karna hai. Ek rasgulla hai toh doosra gulaab jaamun. Aur dono mein ras labalab bhara hai. Ab kaun sa chooj karein ye sochna thoda mushkil hai. Par mushkilein kiski jinadgi mein nahi hoti. (MORE )
Raam lala ko hee dekh lo, kittni mushkilein jheli. Aur woh toh bhagwan the, hum thehre insaan, hai ki nahi.
EXT. CHIRAG’S COURTYARD - MORNING 176 Chirag is heading out. Mother calls out to him.
Kahaan ja rahe ho?
Mandir. As Chirag walks out, mother keeps on instructing from behind.
Suno, do tho nariyal le aana. Aur pooja ke mat laana, chatni banaani hai.
Chirag is entering the school on a bike. He parks the bike.

Bitti’s mother is sitting in the staff room. She is trying to solve ‘Crossword’ on a newspaper. She is looking at the paper with difficulty, keeping it close to her eyes. Chirag enters the staff room.
Namaste aunty.
Khush raho beta. Achcha ye bataao... chanchalta se bharpoor, daayein se baayein, teen akshar ka.  112.
Chapal.
(happy) Haan. As she fills the crossword Chirag takes out specs and keeps it in front of her. She looks at him.
Aapka toot gaya tha na. Humne kaswa diya hai. Mother runs her hand over Chirag’s head.
Tum sabke liye kitna sochte ho na beta. Chirag smiles.
Hum bhi soch rahe hain beta ek baat kai din se.
Kya?
Bitti ki shaadi ke baare mein.
Arre aap chinta mat keejiye aunty, achchi ladki hai Bitti, ho jaayegi. Mother holds Chirag’s one hand with her both hands.
Sach kahein beta, ladka toh najar ke saamne hee hai. Chirag adjusts his collar with his other hand.
Hum Bitti ko mana lenge beta. Bas tum...
(eager) Haan aunty...  179 113.
-.. Vidrohi ji ko mana lo. Chirag takes his hands back and looks worried.
Aunty, Bitti aur Vidrohi ji? Aapko Bitti ne kaha?
Arre kisi ke kehne ki jaroorat hai kya? Saath mein dekhe ho dono ko. Ekdum raam seeta ki jodi hain. Chirag is scandalized.
Ab bas beta tum hanuman ji bann ke hamaare kaleje se pahaad utha lo. Chirag gulps down his saliva. Mother is looking at her.
Kya hua beta? Chirag pretends to be struggling to come up with an answer and then finally breaks the suspense.
Ab kya bataayein aunty. Vidrohi ji ka toh talaak ho chuka hai. Mother looks stunned. School bell ringing in the background.
Chirag and Munna are standing. Vidrohi comes rushing and panting.
Aisa kya ho gaya bhaiya jo itna urgent mein bula liye.  114.
Jo hua woh tumhaare liye achcha nahi hua.
Ab hamaare saath kya ho gaya bhaiya?
Tum Rama ke dil mein pyaar ka jo moti dhoondh rahe ho na, woh kal ek kawwa chug gaya.
Hum samjhe nahi bhaiya.
Abbe Rama ko dekhne kal ladke waale aaye the. Aur unko Rama pasand bhi aa gayi. Vidrohi looks worried.
Aur Rama ne haan bol diya?
Na bhi nahi bola.
(angrily) Ladka kaun hai bhaiya, bas naam bataaiye aap.
Kuch nahi ukhaad paaoge beta tum. Sunaar hai. Sarafe mein dukaan hai. Khaali chaandi chaandi bhi pighlaaye na toh poori Bareilly ke jevar ban jaayein.
Abbe unke yahaan jo shutter uthaata hai na woh bhi tumse jyaada kamaata hai. Vidrohi takes a deep breath and looks down.  115.
(slyly) Lekin... hum Rama ki aankhon mein tumhaare liye pyaar dekhe hain.
(quickly) Haan, haan, hum bhi dekhe hain. Vidrohi looks up.
Toh ab hum kya karein bhaiya?
Hum toh kehte hain kal hee jaake bol do. Vidrohi is thinking.
Arre kawwa moti le jaayega.
Bol dete hain bhaiya.
Aur sabke saamne bolna.
Sabke saamne kyon?
Abbe akele mein toh chumma chaati hoti hain, pyaar ka ijhaar sabke saamne hee hota hai. Chhati thok ke. Vidrohi nods.
Jaao, propose karne ke liye kuch achcha 1likh lo. Vidrohi nods and leaves.
Rama haan bolegi?
Apne ko kya?  180 116. Munna looks at Chirag.
Abbe padosi ke ladke ko aam ke ped pe chhadhaaye hain. Neeche utra toh aam khaane ko milenge, gir ke mar gaya toh terahvi ka khaane ko milega. Munna chuckles.
Ab Rama haan bole ya na, dono haal mein Bitti ka dil tootna hee tootna hai.
(chuckling) Bhaiya aap na bahut neech hain.
Jaante hain.

Wide shot of boat on a lake. Chirag, Munna, Vidrohi, Bitti and Rama are sitting on a boat. The boat is gently rocking. Rama and Bitti are busy dipping their hands in the water. The guide is narrating a story.

iss jheel mein jannmi ye prem kahani hai...film ka naam jawaani deewaani hai. Vinod Khanna aur dharmendra ke beech hua tha ghamaasaan...wajah thi Hema Malini shreeman...Dream girl. Guide continues speaking in the background. Chirag elbows Vidrohi to start the conversation.
Abe bol na.
Ye chup ho toh bolun na.  117. Guide continues to speak.
Mundi ghumaiye udhar aur dekhiye adbhut manzar... Chirag cuts him in between.
O bhaisaab...
Ji Bhaisaab...
Moo band karenge?
Kyun bhaisaab? Chirag just gives him a look angrily. The Guide gets the message.
Ji bhaisaab.
Arre kyun mana kar diya... kitna mazaa toh aa raha tha... Bitti holds Chirag’s face and turns it to the scenery.
(Imitates the guide) Mundi ghumaiye udhar, aur dekhiye adbhut manzar. Chirag then holds Bitti’s face and turns it towards Vidrohi.
Woh... Vidrohi ji kuch kehna chahte hain.
Kya? Vidrohi takes a deep breath and closes his eyes.  118.

Tere dil ne mere dil ko daboch liya hai, mere seene se chain-o- karaar noch liya hai, tere bina zindagi hai empty empty rama, tujhe wife banaana hai, bas soch liya hai. Will you marry me? As Vidrohi finishes the proposal, there is an awkward silence. Vidrohi keeps looking at Rama, Chirag looks at Bitti. Bitti’s face drops and she turns her face away. Rama looks uncomfortable.

Vidrohi ji I’m sorry. Aap bohot achhe hain, main pasand bhi karti hun aapko. Lekin main ek talaakshuda aadmi se shaadi nahi kar sakti. Vidrohi is taken aback, he looks at Munna and Chirag who act clueless.
Talaak? Mera? Arre meri toh aaj tak sagai bhi nahi hui. Bata na Chirag inko.
Chirag ne hi bataya hai. Vidrohi looks at Chirag in disbelief, Chirag acts clueless.
Kya? Near the lotus pond.
(in his tone) Aur ye raha suicide point, yahaan har saal bahattar aashiq jal samaadhi lete hain. Vidrohi is stunned. Rama is looking away. Chirag looks at Bitti who is upset. Chirag smiles lightly.
181 119. INT. CHIRAG’S ROOM —- DAY 181 Chirag and Munna are quietly sitting as Vidrohi fumes in anger.
Aapke paapon ka ghada bhar chuka hai Chirag bhaiya, aur ab hum woh ghada aapke hi sar pe phodenge. Jitna raita phailaaye hain na sab aap hi sameetenge. Looks angrily towards Munna.
Aur tum saale boondi batoroge.
Ai tu aukaat mein reh.
Ai... aukaat mein tu reh warna sach mein laat maar ke koolha barbaad kar denge. Munna tries to say something but words don’t come out of his mouth. He keeps shut.
Arre mazaak bana diya hamaari zindagi ko. Itni mushkil se do pahiye jod ke cycle kase thhe... aap ek jhatke mein chain hi utaar diye. Talaak kara diye hamaara.
Arre Bitti ki amma tumhe daamad banaane pe tuli hai. Kya karte hum bataao? Kya karte? Saala bann jaate tumhaara? Hume jo theek laga humne kar diya, bas.
Aur hamaara jo dil toot gaya woh?
Tumhe yahaan hum apna dil jodne laaye the. Humne bola tha Rama se chonch ladaane ke liye. (MORE )
Ek baar hamaara dil jud jaaye phir jahaan chahe moo maar lena, hame farak nahi padta.
Waah Chirag bhaiya waah. Apni daal galaane ke liye aap kisi ki bhi seeti baja sakte hain na. Ab hum aapki seeti bajaayenge.
Kya kar loge be tum?
Zyada kuch nahi. Aapki naak ke neeche se Bitti uda ke le jaayenge.
Abbe shakal dekhi hai apni. Ladka bhi na patega tumse.
Agar ladkiyaan shakal dekh ke shaadi karti na Chirag bhaiya toh aadha India kuwaara hota.
(lightly) Theek hai. Agar bhoole bhatke se kahin Bitti se tumhaari shaadi ho gayi toh shehnaai main bajaaoonga. Munna giggles.
Aur kursiyaan main jama doonga. Vidrohi gets up and leaves.
Bhaiya ye toh aasteen ka anaconda nikla. Humee ko nigalne ki soch raha hai.
Abbe Bitti haath mein mehandi lagaayegi, gobar nahi. Ye kuch nahi ukhaad paayega.  182 183 121. C/u on Chirag staring.
EXT. CHIRAG’S COURTYARD - CONTINUOUS 182 Chirag and Munna are walking out.
Kahan jaa rahe ho?
Jahannum.
Dahi lete aana pauna kilo... raaita banana hai.
EXT. BITTI’S COURTYARD - LATE EVENING 183 Chirag enters the house and asks the mother.
Aunty Bitti oopar hai na? Mother nods and points towards the terrace. Chirag walks towards the stairs.
Beta Suno... Chirag stops.
Kahan ghoomti rehti hai Bitti raat biraat? Arre ladki hai chudail nahi hai. Samjhao usko tum. Chirag gets a faint smile on his face.
Arre kuch nahi thodi pareshaan hai. (MORE)
Main hoon na, samjha doonga. Aap bas chai bana do...kadak. Mother nods and goes back to doing her work.
EXT. BITTI’S TERRACE - LATE EVENING 184 Bitti is standing quietly. Chirag comes with a smile on his face, the moment Bitti looks at him he makes the smile disappear and shows fake concern.
Kaisi hai Rama ab? Meri hi galti hai yaar, us ghaamad ko lekar hi nahi aana tha yahan. Ek kitaab kya likh li khud ko Ghalib samajhne laga. Bitti just looks at him surprised. Chirag continues.
Achha hua... Rama ne mana kar diya. Na ghar ka raha na ghat ka. Chirag then tries to console Bitti.
Aur yaar letter likhe tumko aur propose kar diya Rama ko... tum please dukhi mat ho.
Main kyon dukhi hone lagi? Chirag is surprised.

Arre talaak hua hai yaar koi murder thodi na kiya hai Vidrohi ji ne. Ho sakta hai koi chudail palley pad gayi ho. Rama itni bewakoof hogi ye nahi socha tha maine. Chirag can’t believe what he is hearing.  185 123.
Tum Rama ki jagah Vidrohi ki side le rahi ho?
Toh kya karein? Tumhaare aur Rama ki tarah hum bhi un pe joote barsaane lagein? Bina poori baat jaane? Arre bahut log humko galat samajhte hain, toh hum galat ho gaye kya?
(straight faced) Bitti meri najar mein tum bilkul galat nahi ho.
Haan, toh meri najar mein Vidrohi ji galat nahi hain. Chirag looks dumbfound. Cut to him walking down the staircase.
EXT. BITTI’S COURTYARD - NIGHT 185 Bitti’s mother is standing with a cup of tea. Chirag comes down the stairs, looking devastated.
Beta chai.
Aaj chai se nahi hoga aunty. Chirag leaves. Mother mumbles.
Arre phir banwayi kyun? Baawan rupye litre ho gaya hai doodh.
Chirag and Munna are drinking. Both are sloshed. Papers around. Sitting behind the huge boxes.
Toone ekdum correct bola tha Munna.
Haan bhaiya... Whiskey ke saath na ubla chana hi achha lagta hai... moomphalli nahi.
Wo nahi... mujhe Bitti ko bata dena chahiye tha... ki bareilly ki barfi maine likhi thi aur letter bhi maine hee likhe thhe.
